item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence. This week's location is: Spats on Angell Street near Brown University!

Abby will give us the low-down and the details - the best one being that the students are still away so there is room for the locals! We've never had a Monday Night Meetup at Spats before, so let's check it out!!!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Abby is hosting this one! Please look at her picture!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Spats!!!
